io.sphere.internal.request

Class RequestHolderImpl<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sphere.internal.request.RequestHolderImpl<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestHolder<T>, TestableRequestHolder

    public class RequestHolderImpl<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements RequestHolder<T>
    A request holder that does real HTTP requests. Can be mocked in tests.
